name: Simple Pneumothorax
chief_complaint: Sudden sharp chest pain and difficulty breathing
physical_findings: decreased breath sounds on affected side

lab_results.CXR: visible pleural line without lung markings

treatment: needle aspiration or chest tube insertion if large
prognosis: Excellent with proper treatment, typically resolves within 2-4 weeks
description: A small, uncomplicated collapse of lung tissue without significant tension or underlying lung disease, often caused by minor trauma or spontaneous rupture of small blebs
